name: XShow-WebSite-Designer
description:
WebSite XShow


An event company wants to implement a system where customers can buy tickets for concerts and events, for this it is necessary that users register in the system and submit their proof of vaccination or negative covid-19 test. The system should consist of the following pages: Home → The customer wants an excerpt of slides showing the main shows and events with tickets available for purchase. Events → A page that displays all concerts and events with tickets available for purchase. Register → A page with a registration form, the registration form must have a validation system to ensure that the user has entered all their data, the password must be entered twice and both must be the same. To register as a debtor user, at least 18 years old. Log in → A login screen Cart → A screen where they are displayed as user purchases.
